title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Unexpected rewards are likely if you take time to reevaluate your priorities today. Perhaps a longstanding difficult relationship with money resurfaces if you discover you cant acquire a coveted treasure. Although this purchase may squeeze your budget, you are yearning to buy it anyway. However, your logic might be clouded by unprocessed wounds from your childhood about not getting something you desired. Fortunately, therapeutic Chiron activates the Moon in your 2nd House of Values, prompting you to take positive action to work through your painful past. Author T. Harv Eker wrote, The first element of change is awareness. You cant change something unless you know it exists. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
